pages.text: Man has always wondered, is there a way to cheat death? The answer is yes*, courtesy of Miskatonic University’s own chemistry labs! Discovered by a Mr. H West, the ReAgent™ is to be injected into the body of the recently deceased subject, which allows them to relive life, with very few side effects.

Prolonged use of this substance causes the subject to build up a tolerance, meaning each resurrection will be a little less lively each time.$(br)$(o)Miskatonic Universities is not responsible for any permanent death, feralization, trauma, night terrors, or general feeling of despair use of this drug can cause$().
